name: Doll Makeover - DIY 3D Dolly
description:
Welcome to Doll Makeover where you get to DIY your own dolly! In this beautiful simulation game, you get to be the creator of your own doll life!

So many customers will ask you to makeover their dolls and you get to fix it with a full doll makeover. You can even collect exclusive designer dolls with special, limited edition dress up themes. DIY has never been more fun!

And when you are done, the final step in packing it all up in a beautiful doll box—you can even make a perfect ken or unicorn companion!

Your doll makeover includes:
> Sculpting new hairstyles and coloring with hair dye on your avatar
> DIY Makeup
> Making a full face makeover with eyeliner and lipsticks for the perfect lips on your doll!
> Dress up your dolly for a fun fashion DIY! You are the avatar creator, you can do whatever you want!
> Collecting a full collection of dolls and their doll box
> And so much more in your very own dolly world!

If you want to run your own toy factory or sculpt people, Doll Makeover is the best game of the year!

To opt out of CrazyLabs sales of personal information as a California resident, please visit our Privacy Policy: https://crazylabs.com/app
